original_title: Chris Brown: A Star Is Born: Unauthorized
overview: This engrossing documentary looks at the life and skyrocketing career of rhythm-and-blues star Chris Brown. Only 17 years old, the talented artist has already achieved great success, receiving a number of Grammy nods and charting several top 10 and top 20 hits. Brown's self-titled debut album has sold more than 3 million copies, and his first single, "Run It," reached No. 1 on Billboard's Hot 100.
title: Chris Brown: A Star Is Born: Unauthorized
